articles.title: Argentina soy, corn forecasts at risk of more cuts as yields disappoint, exchange says
articles.description: BUENOS AIRES, March 17 (Reuters) - Argentina's 2021/22 soybean, corn and sunflower harvest forecasts could be cut further, the Buenos Aires grains exchange said on Thursday, citing lower than expected yields due to adverse weather conditions that have hit crops this year.The entity, which slashed corn and soy production estimates earlier in the year due to drought, currently

articles.title: Footballer Emiliano Sala died as result of plane crash, inquest jury finds
articles.description: The Argentina-born striker died from head and chest injuries but was deeply unconscious, having been poisoned by carbon monoxide.
articles.content:
FOOTBALLER EMILIANO SALA died as a result of a plane crash, having been overcome by toxic levels of carbon monoxide during an unlicensed commercial flight, an inquest jury has concluded.
The Argentina-born striker died from head and chest injuries bu... [3069 chars]

articles.title: Man City told not to expect instant impact from summer transfer Julian Alvarez
articles.description: Manchester City signed Argentina striker Julian Alvarez in January and he is expected to join the club properly in the summer.
articles.content:
Julian Alvarez will need time to adapt at Manchester City next season, former striker Paul Dickov has warned.
City signed Alvarez, 22, for £14m in January before sending him back on loan to River Plate until July. There had been talk in Argentina of ... [2344 chars]

articles.description: Researchers used molecular surveillance to identify cases of co-infection with SARS-CoV-2 variants of concern Delta and Omicron reported in Argentina during December 2021 and January 2022.

articles.title: 4 tigers rescued from Argentina get new home in South Africa
articles.description: Four Bengal tigers rescued from years of captivity in a train carriage in Argentina have been released into open-air enclosures in South Africa.
